  (n,m)      = (          10 ,          10 ) = 
  (n1,m1)*i1 = (           1 ,           1 )*          10

  (n2,m2)*i2 = (           1 ,          -1 )*           3

  r1*r2 (inner product) =    0.0000000000000000     
  r1, r2 =    4.2539167833891627        2.4560000000000000     

  cos**2 + sin**2 =    1.0000000000000000
